sentences.english: Was he thinking of the scandals generated by the Profumo Affair?
sentences.chinese: 他有沒有想到普羅富莫情事引來的醜聞呢？

sentences.english: If said applicant violates any of the regulations, I am willing to take responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 若該君有違反有關規則之情事，本人願負保證之責任。

sentences.english: Winchester's own love affair with the Atlantic began with a passage to America.
sentences.chinese: 溫徹斯特與大西洋的“情事”開始於一次美國旅行。

sentences.english: The new film Notes on a Scandal tells the story of an affair.
sentences.chinese: 新片《醜聞筆記》講述的就是這樣一段情事。

sentences.english: The fifth part does some legal consideration of perfecting the system of Clausula Rebus sic Stantibus .
sentences.chinese: 第五部分對完善我國情事變更制度進行了法律思考。

definition: poetic occasion/elegant situation/in literature, the cue for a poem
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
bed and bamboo sleeping mat/(fig.) bed as a place for intimacy
romance/beautiful scenery/small or petty (of talk etc)
the pleasure of close intimacy in a couple (idiom)/sexual intercourse
(of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental
to be enamored of/to have tender feelings for/to be sentimentally attached to (a person or place)
